articles.title: Iran’s supreme leader has been killed during major attack, Trump says
articles.description:
“Khamenei, one of the most evil people in History, is dead,” Trump wrote in a social media post.

The post Iran’s supreme leader has been killed during major attack, Trump says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Iran's supreme leader, Ayatollah Khamenei, reportedly killed during a major attack.
Former President Trump announced Khamenei's death on social media, calling him 'evil'.
Potential geopolitical shifts may affect Boston's Iranian community and local businesses.

articles.title: Jayson Tatum won’t make return from Achilles tear in Celtics’ matchup vs. 76ers
articles.description:
76er star Joel Embiid will also miss Sunday's game with an oblique strain.

The post Jayson Tatum won’t make return from Achilles tear in Celtics’ matchup vs. 76ers appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jayson Tatum will not return from his Achilles tear for the Celtics' game on February 28.
76ers' star Joel Embiid will also miss the game due to an oblique strain.
Celtics face a challenging matchup without Tatum, impacting their playoff positioning.
